title: Our Vision
body: The Olabisi Onabanjo University shall be the center of academic excellence where Knowledge, kills and value will pursued relentlessly to ensure the flowering of human abilities, service to the Nigerian nation and the world at large in the wider context of traditional wisdom and culture.

title: Our Mission
body: The Olabisi Onabanjo University shall be the center of academic excellence where Knowledge, kills and value will pursued relentlessly to ensure the flowering of human abilities, service to the Nigerian nation and the world at large in the wider context of traditional wisdom and culture.
